attributes.additional_details:
The Wind Farm would have a detrimental effect on Marine Life, Birds, Fishing Industry, Shellfish & Fish, Surf, Tourist Industry as well as devastate the countryside through which the 60metre wide corridor of cables will run.
We, the undersigned, object to the proposal to build the ‘Atlantic Array’ Offshore Wind Farm. We would ask that The Secretary of State for Energy & Climate Change, The Right Hon Chris Hume refuse this proposal.
